blocks.content: Cooking Game was an ambitious attempt to gamify the culinary process: players would select a recipe, identify the correct ingredients, and simulate cooking through interactive steps. Built entirely with native Android Studio UI components, the project was a deep dive into layout design, state management, and user interaction.

While the gameplay didn't quite hit the mark — it lacked the spark to keep players engaged — the development journey was anything but wasted. It taught valuable lessons in user experience, flow control, and the importance of balancing mechanics with fun.
